hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever is invited to eat when he is fasting, let him accept the invitation; and if he wants to let him eat, and if he wants let him not eat.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ دُعِيَ إِلَى طَعَامٍ وَهُوَ صَائِمٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who is invited to eat when he is fasting
